          <title>
            <string language="en">Light reflection from shiny surfaces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Reflexion von den glänzenden Oberflächen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion légère des surfaces brillantes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão clara das superfícies brilhantes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione chiara dalle superfici lucide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά αντανάκλαση από τις λαμπρές επιφάνειες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión ligera de superficies brillantes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows light reflection from shiny surfaces such as mirror and polished metal spoon.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polished surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shiny surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spoon</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt helle Reflexion von den 
glänzenden Oberflächen wie Spiegel und poliertem Metalllöffel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la réflexion légère 
des surfaces brillantes telles que le miroir et la cuillère polie en 
métal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a reflexão clara das 
superfícies brilhantes tais como o espelho e a colher lustrada do 
metal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la riflessione chiara
dalle superfici lucide quali lo specchio ed il cucchiaio lucidato del 
metallo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ελαφριά αντανάκλαση από 
τις λαμπρές επιφάνειες όπως ο καθρέφτης και το γυαλισμένο 
κουτάλι μετάλλων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la reflexión ligera de
superficies brillantes tales como espejo y cuchara pulida del metal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
